tool_description:
Extract data from online news & articles. Get full metadata with content, images, authors, summary, category, keywords, topics, and more.

Automatic data extraction from articles, products, discussions, and more. This API uses advanced AI technology to retrieve clean, structured data without the need for manual rules or site-specific training.
name: News Article Data Extract and Summarization
title: News Article Data Extract and Summarization
tool_name: News Article Data Extract and Summarization

api_list.name: extract
api_list.description:
Enter a URL for the news article to extract all its fields. 
See documentation for the description of each field.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-article-data-extract-and-summarization1.p.rapidapi.com/extract/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-article-data-extract-and-summarization1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-article-data-extract-and-summarization1.p.rapidapi.com/extract/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-article-data-extract-and-summarization1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
